Subject: Crawl summary for completed crawl jobs
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=234926651; y=r1rQdKNJz41AR8Jr2HU68zXXm93pgG2PaEPNJSper1ohZw
X-Yahoo-Profile: mccownf

I have recently completed some modifications to Heritrix 1.9 that allow 
users to see a crawl report and seed report for completed crawl jobs. 
Currently if the user tries to view these reports, they are given a "No 
statistics associated with job" message.

I've got example pages available here to look at (click on links under 
Enhancements):

http://www.cs.odu.edu/~fmccown/heritrix/

If you guys would like to incorporate this functionality into Heritrix, 
let me know.

You'll notice that I separated DNS entries from HTTP crawl data.  This 
better suits my needs, but perhaps others would prefer it together? 
Also I added a TLD distribution.

I would appreciate any feedback you all might have.

Thanks,
Frank
